CO M P E T E N C Y
MA T R I X_____________________________________________
Testing of:
oNumerical Relays (Alstom, Siemens, Schneider, SEL, & GE)

oGIS substation 220/132/66/11kV, 132/66/11kV, 66/11kV voltage levels

11kV/415V voltage level

oProtection Panels of SIEMENS, ABB, SCHNEIDER & ALSTOM
Programming of:
oALSTOM & SCHNEIDER Numerical Relays by Using MiCOM S1 Studio & Agile
software tool
oSIEMENS Numerical Relays by Using DIGSI software tool
oSEL Numerical Relays by Using AcSELerator software tool

2010 & 2007
Troubleshooting & Servicing of:
oElectromechanical Relays – Disk & Armature type (English Electric Make)
oStatic Relays (GEC ALSTOM & ABB)
oNumerical Relays (Alstom, Schneider)
Handling  activities  which involves Firmware  & Software up gradation  of  the relays,
refurbishment of old electromechanical relays by new numerical relays.

equipment to increase machine uptime & equipment reliability
Implement  maintenance  schedules  and  carrying  out  periodic  checks  to  ensure
performance & maintaining requisite documents for the same

& cost parameters and utilizing resources to maximize output
